item.description:
Due to the hospitalization of Mitt Romney impersonator Tim Gossett, in the Obama vs. Romney Political Comedy show, there has been a revision in the Political Comedy Brigade Show.

We are able to have a performance of the show as a Political Comedy Brigade featuring Barack Obama, Bill Clinton and Donald Trump impersonators for the Saturday November 3rd  show at Steeple Hall @ Mission Oak Grill in Newburyport, MA.

The new show details are as follows:

William Gold Entertainment and Drinkwater Productions present Politicos Comedy Brigade, live at Mission Oak Grill tomorrow night, Saturday, November 3rd. Join renowned President Barack Obama impersonator Maxwell Price (HBO's Flight of the Conchords, NPR's This American Life), Donald Trump impersonator John Di Domenico (Meet the Spartans, Disaster Movie), and America's original Bill Clinton impersonator Tim Watters (over 200 appearances on NBC's The Tonight Show with Jay Leno), for an evening of political comedy and campaign chaos. Politicos Comedy Brigade is proud to feature opening comic Scott Blakeman, the highly astute political comedian and Beltway observer best known for his regular high-profile appearances on MSNBC, FOX News, Current TV, and FOXNews.com Live. Tickets are available for $35 at www.drinkwaterproductions.com or by calling 855-255-5750. Doors open at 7:00pm at which time a bar menu is available to patrons. Show time is 8:00pm.



We look forward to a great show on Saturday at Steeple Hall @ Mission Oak Grill!

 

Politicos Comedy Brigade is the world’s greatest team of impersonators, character actors, and impressionists, featuring comedic portrayals of past, current, and future Presidents along with some of the most recognizable faces in American politics and pop culture today. Visit them at www.politicoscomedy.com
item.name: Political Comedy Brigade-updated show details
